parameters.query:
WITH todas_datas AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date,
        CURRENT_DATE-1,
        '1 day'
    ) AS dia
),
lojas_relevantes AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT unit_id
    FROM sales
    WHERE date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date
      AND date < DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)::date
),
comb_lojas_datas AS (
    SELECT l.unit_id, d.dia
    FROM lojas_relevantes l
    CROSS JOIN todas_datas d
),
vendas_aggregadas AS (
    SELECT unit_id, date, SUM(value) AS total_venda
    FROM sales
    WHERE date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date
      AND date <= CURRENT_DATE
    GROUP BY unit_id, date
)
SELECT 
    cd.unit_id,
    cd.dia,
    COALESCE(va.total_venda, 0) AS venda_do_dia
FROM 
    comb_lojas_datas cd
LEFT JOIN 
    vendas_aggregadas va
    ON cd.unit_id = va.unit_id AND cd.dia = va.date
ORDER BY 
    cd.unit_id, cd.dia;
select * from units where unit_block=false and unit_id<900

WITH todas_datas AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        CASE 
            WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE) <= 5 THEN
                DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date  -- Mês passado completo
            ELSE
                DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)::date  -- Só o mês atual
        END,
        CURRENT_DATE - 1,
        '1 day'
    ) AS dia
),
lojas_relevantes AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT unit_id
    FROM sales
    WHERE date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date
),
comb_lojas_datas AS (
    SELECT l.unit_id, d.dia
    FROM lojas_relevantes l
    CROSS JOIN todas_datas d
),
vendas_aggregadas AS (
    SELECT unit_id, date, SUM(value) AS total_venda
    FROM sales
    WHERE date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date
      AND date <= CURRENT_DATE
    GROUP BY unit_id, date
)
SELECT 
    cd.unit_id,
    cd.dia,
    COALESCE(va.total_venda, 0) AS venda_do_dia
FROM 
    comb_lojas_datas cd
LEFT JOIN 
    vendas_aggregadas va
    ON cd.unit_id = va.unit_id AND cd.dia = va.date
ORDER BY 
    cd.unit_id, cd.dia;
select * from units where unit_block=false and unit_id<900

WITH todas_datas AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date, -- Início do mês passado
        CURRENT_DATE, -- Até a data atual
        '1 day'
    ) AS dia
),
lojas_relevantes AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT "unitId" as unit_id
    FROM coupons
    WHERE date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date
      AND date <= CURRENT_DATE + 1 -- Ajuste para pegar até o final do dia
),
comb_lojas_datas AS (
    SELECT l.unit_id, d.dia
    FROM lojas_relevantes l
    CROSS JOIN todas_datas d
),
vendas_aggregadas AS (
    SELECT
        c."unitId" as unit_id,
        c.date::date AS dia,
        SUM(cf.value) AS total_venda
    FROM coupons c
    INNER JOIN coupons_finishers cf ON cf."couponId" = c.id
    WHERE c.date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month')::date
      AND c.date <= CURRENT_DATE + 1
    GROUP BY c."unitId", dia
)
SELECT
    cd.unit_id,
    cd.dia,
    COALESCE(va.total_venda, 0) AS venda_do_dia
FROM
    comb_lojas_datas cd
LEFT JOIN
    vendas_aggregadas va
    ON cd.unit_id = va.unit_id AND cd.dia = va.dia
ORDER BY
    cd.unit_id, cd.dia;
select * from units where unit_block=false and unit_id<900
